description: Variation of condition 2 (approved drawings) of planning permission 24/01309 to allow alterations at Lower Ground Floor: enlargement of permitted extension to front elevation; rearrangement of front light well stairs providing consolidated access from street level; depth of lightwell reduced, and walk-on grill modified. At Upper Ground Floor: flat roof modified to suit lower ground floor extension; additional rooflight above lower ground floor extension at rear; railings modified to suit revised lightwell proposals to front elevation; relocation of permitted Upper Ground Floor wall adjacent to No. 10 to increase width of the extension at that level - proposed location set in slightly from party wall with corner inset; installation of two white painted, timber framed French double doors with slimline double glazing; and addition of railings to form terrace bookended by timber trellis privacy screening. At Third Floor and Roof Level: side dormer enlarged to full width of chimney stack wall; existing opening location and style retained but upgraded with slimline double glazing and installation of two rooflights to side dormer
